Package it.polimi.ingsw.utils.messages.serverMessages

Interface ServerMessage

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ActionError, ActivateProductionError, ActivateProductionUpdate, ActivateVaticanReportUpdate, BlackCrossMoveUpdate, BuyDevCardError, BuyDevCardPerformedUpdate, ErrorMessage, FaithMarkerUpdate, GameResumedMessage, GameSetupMessage, InitialLeaderChoiceUpdate, InitialResourceChoiceUpdate, InvalidMessageError, JoinLobbyMessage, LastTurnMessage, LeaderActionError, LeaderActionUpdate, LorenzoActivatedVaticanReportUpdate, LorenzoPlayedUpdate, MoveResourcesError, MoveUpdate, NewTurnUpdate, NotAvailableNicknameMessage, PongMessage, PositioningUpdate, RankMessage, ServerAskForGameMode, ServerAskForNumOfPlayer, ServerAsksForNickname, ServerAsksForPositioning, SoloModeMatchWinnerMessage, TakeResourcesFromMarketError, TakeResourcesFromMarketUpdate, UpdateMessage, UserDisconnectedMessage, WrongTurnError
public interface ServerMessage
extends java.io.Serializable
Interface that encapsulates all messages sent by server to clients. It implements Serializable in order to allow message exchange through the network.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void handleMessage​(Client handler)
    Method that establishes how the client will manage message itself.

  • Method Details

    • handleMessage

      void handleMessage​(Client handler)
      Method that establishes how the client will manage message itself.
      Parameters:
      handler - Client instance that has to handle the message.
